<The 2015 Queen's Birthday Honours
2:
--------------------
Text: 2015 Birthday Honours:  The Queen's Birthday Honours were announced on 1 June 2015 in New Zealand, on 8 June in Australia, and on 12 June in the United Kingdom, in Grenada, Papua New Guinea, Solomon Islands, Tuvalu, Saint Lucia and Belize.
